verses.roman:
aiche sabāra nāma lañā prabhura āge dhare
santuṣṭa hañā prabhu saba bhojana kare

synonyms: aiche—in this way; sabāra nāma—everyone's name; lañā—taking; prabhura āge—before the Lord; dhare—he places; santuṣṭa hañā—being very satisfied; prabhu—the Lord; saba—all; bhojana kare—began to eat.
translation: In this way, Govinda gave everyone's name as he put the food before the Lord. Being very satisfied, the Lord began to eat it all.
